name: prisma-article-example
description: <<Prisma: 下一代ORM, 不仅仅是ORM>> Demo 仓库

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run gen
scripts.gen: npm run gen:single && npm run gen:multi
scripts.gen:single: cd dist/single-model && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate
scripts.gen:multi: cd dist/multi-models && prisma db push --preview-feature && prisma generate

author: linbudu599
